wikitext.*:
'''Frances Walsh''' ([[10 January|January 10]], [[1959]]) is a New Zealand screenwriter and producer. She is the wife of [[Peter Jackson]], director of  ''[[The Lord of the Rings (film series)]]'' and ''[[The Hobbit (film series)]]''. She, Jackson, and [[Philippa Boyens]] are credited with writing the screenplays for all six films, as well as [[Guillermo del Toro]] for ''The Hobbit (film series)''. She also wrote the songs  "[[Gollum's Song]]", "[[Into the West]]" and "[[A Shadow Lies Between Us]]". Walsh also provided the "Ringwraith scream" sound effect for the films.
